conversation.message:
Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for your message and for your continued interest in Nursery_C.

At this time, our remaining place has not been offered to you because we must follow our fixed priority order for this cycle. We are not able to “hold” or “reserve” the place for a lower-priority family while skipping higher-priority families; instead, any offer is made in priority order if/when the place becomes available to the next family in that order.

We do not have a separate waitlist mechanism that would move a family ahead of the priority order, and there is no rolling timeline I can share that would guarantee when (or whether) an offer could be made to your family. If circumstances change such that the place can be offered to you under the priority order, we would contact you at that time.

Given this uncertainty, I would encourage you to continue pursuing your other preferred options in parallel.

Sincerely,
Nursery_C Admissions

If/when the place can be offered to the next family in the priority order (e.g., because higher-priority families have secured placements elsewhere and are no longer active), we would proceed accordingly and contact the relevant family at that time.
